This torrent is useless. The videos are wrapped in multi-segment .rar archives, one of which has a bad CRC. Extraction is basically impossible, and the video would probably be corrupted if it were.nnWill somebody please explain to the fucking idiot who designed this torrent that:nn(a) There\'s no point in wrapping files in archives if they\'re going to be distributed by torrent, because torrent software already includes CRC checks;nn(b) Wrapping torrented files in archives just adds to the inconvenience of people who download the torrents, and may very well render them useless;nn(c) If you\'re going to wrap your torrented files in an archive, there\'s no point in making it a multi-segment archive;nn(d) If you\'re going to archive your files before designing your torrent, you should make sure that the archives can be extracted;nn(e) You need to stop fondling your sister; andnn(f) Everyone knows that you\'re fucking retarded?nnThanks.
